name: French Lace Paper Doilies 4" -Set of 25
description:
These Lovely 4" French Lace Paper Doilies can be used to turn any occasion 
into a special one!. These doilies will beautify your table settings, they add elegance 
to any project, they can be used for serving trays to create decorative food presentation, embellish your craft projects and turn an ordinary scrapbook page into an elegant one by stamping or dying them in many colors. You can accent any centerpieces for your wedding, 
baby shower, garden party or birthdays. They are also now been used to package gift boxes. They are just great for any occasions.

You will receive 25 French Lace Paper Doilies 4" 

Please contact me if you would like larger quantities.

Bakers Twine and Gift Tags also available at our shop. http://www.etsy.com/shop/TheLovelyMemories

name: Vintage Glass Bottle (Set of 12)
description:
Our lovely vintage single stem bottles are one of our most popular wedding table decorations, they can be mismatch with other sizes, shapes and colors vases for a lovely wedding table decorations or any special event. 

Our Listing includes 12 Vintage Bottles of your color choice you can mismatch or choose 1 color:
Clear
Fuchsia Pink
Red 
Orange
Chartreuse Green
Turquoise Blue
Purple

These vintage bottles are painted glass style reminiscent of antique medicine bottles. Perfect for cut flowers. Mix and match with our many other vintage styles. 

Glass Dimensions: 1.75 inches square x 6.5 inches tall.

name: Divine Twine - Set of 3 Assorted Colors Spools 240 Yards each
description:
Divine Twine - The Original Eco-Luxe Bakers Twine

This Listing is for a set of 3 Full Spools -240 yards each 
of any color of your choice. 


Divine Twine is perfect for crafting and scrapbooking or pair with our Bitty Bags or Printables to create extra-special gift wrapping, favors or product packaging. 
Please note: Divine Twineâ„¢ has not been tested for direct food contact.

It's made from 100% cotton so it's soft to the touch, bio-degradable and earth-friendly. Plus the 4-ply construction makes it nice and strong. It's produced in the USA in mouth-watering colors that look good enough to eat. Each spool contains 240 yards, enough to last a long time, yet easy to store.

Spool dimensions are 2" diameter by 4" tall


Our Twine is available in assorted colors please specify colors choice at checkout. 
(Sold in set of 3) 
Air Mail Divine Twine
Aqua Divine Twine
Black Licorice Divine Twine
Blueberry Divine Twine
Brown Sugar Divine Twine
Cherry Divine Twine
Cotton Candy Divine Twine
Green Apple Divine Twine
Lemon Yellow Divine Twine
Orange Divine Twine
Oyster Divine Twine
Purple Plum Divine Twine

Note: Twine keeper/holder in images not included.

name: White Cotton Lace Parasol
description:
This vintage style parasol is a lovely accessory for the bride or bridesmaids . It's elegant and attractive for any occasion.

They're also beautiful as home decor (they look especially good when backlit!) and as party and wedding decorations. More and more, people are using parasols as party and wedding favors-they provide comfort and fun to guests during outdoor summer celebrationis, and can be taken home as a memorable thank-you for the special day.

Parasol is made with cotton lace. There is a matching liner in the inside middle to define the stunning color and protect more from the sun. The parasol is 31 inches in diameter and has a 25 inch stem with a carved wooden handle. The top is decorated with a wooden finial and the under carriage is metal. Our parasols are designed principally to provide shade from the sun. They can be used as colorful, protective fashion accessories on sunny days.

Also available in other colors:
Ivory
Rose
Turquoise

name: Mini linen drawstring pouch with english tea rose decorative trim -Set of 24
description:
Mini Linen Drawstring Pouch with English Tea Rose Decorative Trim
The romantic nature of this drawstring bag makes it ideal for a rustic or vintage wedding.
The classic rose print embellishes the simple design perfectly. Pair it with handwritten tags to create a gift for any event. Great Favor for a Garden Party, Bridal Shower, Tea Party or any other vintage style event. 

Ribbon and Tag not included (Sold Separately) Sold for additional $0.50 Each
Send me a message if you would like to include personalized tags.

Set of 24 Bags
Size: 3" X 4" H
Materials: Cotton Fabric
